page.title: 06Societies
page.content: Chew Magna offers a wide range of societies to cater for different age-groups and interests. All villagers are automatically members of the Chew Magna Society whose committee organises the Summer Fayre, the Harvest Supper, the children's Christmas parties and the senior citizens' dinner as well as assisting with the upkeep of the village. Older villagers enjoy their Richard Vere Club while the ladies have the W.I. and the Wives Club. The Chew Magna Players provide excellent entertainment of an unusually high standard. St. Andrew's Workshop works hard to raise money for the fabric of the Church. The Choral Society and Gardening Club involve all age-groups with the Young Farmers, Brownies,Guides and Scouts for youngsters.
